title: [Here endeth the boke of Iohn Maunduyle knyght of wayes to Ierusalem [and] of marueylys of y5xx]
author: Mandeville, John, Sir.
notes: Attributed to John Mandeville, but in fact an English version of a text known as "Itinerarium". The original was probably written in Anglo-Norman French and has been attributed to Jean d'Outremeuse.
Title from k4r; publication date from STC; printer's name from colophon.
Imperfect; title page, other leaves lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
